snippet.title: Delver Gameplay HD
snippet.description:
About this game/Review
About this game:

Delve into the shifting dungeons on your hunt for the Yithidian orb, but getting it might just be the easy part. Delver is a single player first-person action roguelike dungeon crawler, just like you wished they used to make.

Delver on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/249630/Delver/

Review:
=====( ☺ Audience )=====
☑ Kids
☑ Everyone
☑ Casual players
☑ Pro players
☑ Tryhard players
=====( ✝ Graphics )=====
☐ Extremely bad
☐ Very bad
☑ Bad
☐ OK
☐ Good
☐ Beautiful
☐ Masterpiece
=====( $ Price )=====
☐ Free
☐ Full price
☑ Wait for sale
☐ Average
☐ Refund it if you can
☐ not even worth buying
☐ not even worth buying even free
=====( ☣ Requirments )=====
☐ 90' PC
☑ Minimum
☐ Medium
☐ Fast
☐ High end
☐ NASA computer
=====( ✝ Difficulty )=====
☐ You just need 2 arms
☐ Easy
☐ Easy to learn / Hard to master
☐ Average
☑ Hard (first few hours)
☐ Dark Souls
+☑ Use your luck
=====( ۞ Game time/length )=====
☐ Really short ( 0 - 2 hours)
☐ Short ( 2 - 6 hours)
☐ Few hours ( 6 - 10 hours)
☑ Long ( 10 - 20 hours)
☐ Very long ( 20-50 hours)
☐ Extremely long ( 50-100 hours)
☐ Persona 5 ( 100+ hours)
+☐ Endless
=====( ↕ Story ) =====
☐ It doesn't have
☐ Just plot
☑ Average
☐ Good
☐ Very good
☐ Fantastic
☐ Masterpiece
+☐ I can't forget this game story
=====( § Bugs )=====
☐ Game itself is one big BUG
☐ Bugs destroying the game
☐ Lot of Bugs
☐ Few Bugs
☑ 1-3 Bugs found
☐ Nothing
+☐ You can use them for speedrun
=====( ♫ Audio )=====
☐ ....................
☑ Better than nothing
☐ Average
☐ Good
☐ Very good
☐ Fantastic
☐ Masterpiece
=====( ！ Tutorial )=====
☑ It doesn't have/not good enough
☐ Average
☐ Good
☐ Very good
☐ Explain everything
=====[ ✦ Others: ]=====
Singleplayer: Yes
Multiplayer: No
Early Access: No

If you enjoyed this video, please like and subscribe my channel :)
☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺
